name: Rain Demo (Storm2047)
description:
CONTROLS ----- 

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys, Jump with Space, Reset To last checkpoint with R and Move to next scene with N and back with B

Tips----

Hold space to jump higher

The jetpack slows your fall

Theres a bug- I mean... a "feature"  ;)  where if you hit a wall, you get your jetpack back! (its a wall jump)

If your moving in an upwards motion, and you press space you will go up with your jetpack

other stuff idk ------

This game is not finished yet, still tons of bugs, but its getting better. 

The goal by the end of it is for it to be a metroidvania

I made the tags for what i want the final tags to be like, idk if im supposed to do that or not.

The levels are not yell "beatable", well they can be beaten but nothing happens, there is a little suprise for those who beat the harder course. The last level is just made of intresting stuff i found lol.
